input.value: No valid storage system id found.
An error occurred while trying to fetch storage pools for storage system or no matching record(s) found. Error:

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <xsl:for-each select="//StoragePool"> <item> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Name-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">,Id-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./ID" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </item> </xsl:for-each> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Select a Storage Pool to be provisioned

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">default</xsl:text> </item> <xsl:for-each select="//output/command-response"> <item> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Name-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./Name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">,Id-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="./ID" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </item> </xsl:for-each> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: An error occurred while trying to fetch storage system details or no matching record(s) found. Error:

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <command> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create</xsl:text> </command> <category> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">volume</xsl:text> </category> <process-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create-storage-volume</xsl:text> </process-id> <command-arguments> <pool-id>${pool id}</pool-id> <xsl:if test="string('${setting id}')!=''"> <storage-setting-id>${setting id}</storage-setting-id> </xsl:if> <size> <xsl:value-of select="number(//vol-size)*1024" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </size> <name> <xsl:value-of select="//vol-name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> </command-arguments> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: contains('${vendor}', "LSI") or contains('${vendor}', "lsi") or contains('${vendor}', "Lsi") or contains('${vendor}', "LSi") or contains('${vendor}', "lSI") or contains('${vendor}', "lsI")

input.value: cacheahead is the cache read-ahead multiplier (0 to 65535 bytes). A cache read-ahead multiplier copies additional data blocks into the cache while it is reading and copying host-requested data blocks from disk to cache. Select the multiplier that maximizes performance for the way the volume will be utilized.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <command> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create</xsl:text> </command> <category> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">volume</xsl:text> </category> <process-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create-storage-volume</xsl:text> </process-id> <command-arguments> <pool-id>${pool id}</pool-id> <cacheahead>${ca}</cacheahead> <segmentsize>${segment size}</segmentsize> <xsl:if test="string('${setting id}')!=''"> <storage-setting-id>${setting id}</storage-setting-id> </xsl:if> <lsi /> <size> <xsl:value-of select="number(//vol-size)*1024" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </size> <name> <xsl:value-of select="//vol-name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> </command-arguments> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
